Title: Brindaavanam
Writer: Siva Koratala (dialogues), Vamsi Paidipally (screenplay), Vamsi Paidipally (story), Vasu Varma
Actors: Junior N.T.R., Kajal Aggarwal, Samantha Ruth Prabhu, Prakash Raj
Plot: Krish (NTR) is the son of a billionaire businessman (mukesh Rishi). He has a girl friend Indu (samantha). Her friend Bhoomi (kajal) wants to pursue her higher studies and lands in trouble ...
